alert.note: Alert for Mason; McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 1:16PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN MCCULLOCH...NORTHEASTERN MASON AND SAN SABA COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM CDT... At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Harkeyville, or near Algerita. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... San Saba, Richland Springs, Algerita, Cherokee, Pontotoc, Fredonia, Sloan, Elm Grove, Camp San Saba, Rochelle, Camp Air, Skeeterville, Katemcy, Placid, Mercury, Voca, Hall, Regency, Locker, and Harkeyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
